```{r}
# Load necessary library
library(sf)

# Read the CSV file into R
spreadsheet <- read.csv("C:/Users/Oren/Nardi_workspace/Tech/OFO/StemMaps/Data/805_Snow/Data/TrackingSheet/805_Snow.csv")

# Convert the data frame to an sf object
# Specify the columns containing the X and Y coordinates
sf_object <- st_as_sf(spreadsheet, coords = c("X_Corrected", "Y_Corrected"))

# Assign a CRS if needed (WGS84)
 sf_object <- st_set_crs(sf_object, 4326)

# Write the sf object to a GeoPackage
st_write(sf_object, "C:/Users/Oren/Nardi_workspace/Tech/OFO/StemMaps/Data/805_Snow/Data/Projected_CSV/Snow805.gpkg", delete_dsn = TRUE)
```
